content:
**note ** free registration is required to access the patterns at freepatterns com **materials ** * crochet cotton size 10 1 ball each white kelly green and shaded pinks or shaded yellows * steel crochet hook size 7
**finished size ** approximately 12-1/2 inches 32 cm in diameter
**publications ** * *doilies* star doily book no 104 american thread company 1953 * *old-time crochet magazine* vol 19 no 1 spring 1997
available as flower blooms in howb one-day doilies > this pattern was formerly available at celt s vintage crochet http //www angelfire com/folk/celtwich/blossom html
